name: EUO Boomer Shooter
description:
EUO Boomer Shooter is a single player retro-styled first person shooter, spun off from my MMORPG EUOtopia (https://euotopia.com), which itself is a spinoff (although now far removed) from Ultima 5.

Features:

  • 15 levels +1 secret level
  • 3 weapons
  • 6 original tunes
  • 5 monsters and 1 boss at the end

Levels come straight from EUO. The 3D levels in this game are generated on the fly from 2D maps from the RPG. Creating new levels is easy since it just uses EUO's 2d map editor.

The game is pretty short: you should be able to speed run it in about 30 mins - times to beat are provided.
